resources.string: Once a retreat for Hawaiian royalty and today is often called one of the best beaches on Maui.
This secret south Maui paradise is an ideal getaway for white sand beach and an underwater reef.
The calm waters offer great swimming, and natural tide pools give children the opportunity to see sea creatures up close.
This extension of Ka ªanapali Beach is an ideal spot for snorkeling and scuba diving.
Napili Bay is well known for its golden sand, great snorkeling and picture-perfect sunsets.
Beautiful, calm waters make for great snorkeling and swimming for the kids.
